subtitle.Text: You know it’s really about the ideals that we were trying to get across in our music, I think that the move to equality for women and for everyone in the US is something that we all want to be a part of and we used riot grrrl and we used music as the tool for that.

But it’s really, to me, it’s about equality for everyone, that I think is the key and that’s why young people really feel passionate and they listen to the music and they hear that passion and that’s what they connect with.
